page.title: 08NURSING HOME
page.content: The Nursing home is in Holcott by the rectory. The rectory has a seat and a playing field for cildren to play. The nursing home is for old people. The nursing home has 22 bedrooms and some of the old people have to share. In their rooms they have a tv and a telephone. The staff are very helpful. Outside they have gardens. They have a dinning room to eat in and if they can't walk they have there meals in there rooms. They have bed pans if they can't walk to the toilet and they have a speal chair so they can go up and down the stairs. The nursing home dosen't have rules. Their family or friends can take them out for the day. The Nursing home is very clean and it is 250 years old.
